nodes.text: Coronet Arms Hotel was a hotel in Coronet City on Corellia. During the Cold War, the rebellion and Galactic Republic turned it into an artillery firebase in order to repel the Sith Empire. The defenders fought back numerous assaults from the Sith, boosting the resistance's morale and leading to celebrations in the hotel.
To break their spirits, Sith Lord Malichose tasked an Imperial official with eliminating the defenders at the hotel and destroying their artillery.
